pages.title: Auto Step-up
pages.text: $(br)Press $(bold)J$() to enable or disable $(key)Auto Step-up$(). This allows you to automatically step up blocks that are $(bold)1$() block high while walking, without jumping.

$(br)If you've disabled this feature but you still $(key)auto step-up$(), it may be because you are wearing equipment or trinkets that grant $(key)Auto Step-up$(). Check your $(bold)boots$() or your $(bold)feet trinket slot$().
